about_the_game:
At the opening of the Age of Cygnus, a great era of commerce begins. Traders ply this vast frontier, transporting cargo between planetary systems, discovering markets, and establishing trade routes.
The player, newly graduated from Trade Academy, has the option to chart their career path among the stars. As a space mariner, smuggler, or pirate (or a cunning mix), the player collects crew members and star maps needed to succeed in the unforgiving void of space. Friends and foes are everywhere, and whom the player can trust often is based on loyalty to profit over loyalty to the player.

About the Demo:
Smugglers of Cygnus is coming as an early access alpha demo for free to give everyone an opportunity to watch the game grow and mature.
Players will be able to explore the game as we expand, develop, add content, replace placeholders with final assets, and build it out without having to ever worry if they spent money on an unfinished game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1050 or AMD Radeon RX 570
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 2070 or AMD Radeon RX 6000
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Raytracing capable card required to use raytracing

short_description: Smugglers of Cygnus places you in command of a ship in the service of that noblest profession: Commerce. Travel the galaxy. Deliver goods. Deliver goods of questionable legality for higher rates. Fend off pirates, or perhaps become one yourself...The Galaxy is yours. Come and take it.
